competitors.name: Majesco
competitors.notes: Technology and insurance experience provider for P&C and L&AH insurers, offering platform solutions for core insurance functions, data management, analytics, distribution, underwriting

competitors.name: Duck Creek Technologies
competitors.notes: Solutions provider focused on P&C and general insurance industry with cloud-based platform for insurance systems

competitors.name: Sapiens
competitors.notes: Specializes in providing insurance software solutions across various sectors of the insurance industry

competitors.name: OneShield
competitors.notes: Provides core insurance platform solutions for P&C insurers and managing general agents (MGAs)

competitors.name: BriteCore
competitors.notes: Alternative platform for insurance administration, cited as overall alternative to Guidewire InsuranceSuite

context: Guidewire Software, Inc. is a software for property and casualty insurers focused on core insurance systems, data analytics, and digital engagement. IPO. Leading P&C core platform provider.
